  • public abstract class BaseTeleop
extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode

    • Method Detail

      • buildRobot

        protected abstract Robot buildRobot()
        An abstract method that is used to instantiate the robot.
        Returns:
        The robot being used in the opmode.

      • onInit

        protected void onInit()
        Method that runs when the robot is initialized. It is not an abstract method so that it does not have to be implemented if it is unneeded.

      • onInitLoop

        protected void onInitLoop()
        Method that runs in a loop after the robot is initialized. It is not an abstract method so that it does not have to be implemented if it is unneeded.

      • onStart

        protected void onStart()
        Method that runs when the robot is started. It is not an abstract method so that it does not have to be implemented if it is unneeded.

      • onUpdate

        protected void onUpdate()
        Method that runs every loop cycle. It is not an abstract method so that it does not have to be implemented if it is unneeded.

      • onStop

        protected void onStop()
        Method that runs when the robot is stopped. It is not an abstract method so that it does not have to be implemented if it is unneeded.

                              java.lang.Runnable runner)
        Waits for a specified number of milliseconds, running a function in a loop while its waiting.
        Parameters:
        millis - The number of milliseconds to wait.
        runner - The code to run each loop while waiting.
